DOC.brief_summary: This is a trial of treatment with tablets containing magnesium for leg cramps in pregnancy.
DOC.brief_title: Does Oral Magnesium Substitution Relieve Pregnancy Induced Leg Cramps ?
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy pregnant women between 18 and 36 weeks of pregnancy suffering from leg cramps at least twice a week were treated with magnesium tablets or placebo for two weeks, 120 mg x 3 daily.
DOC.criteria: Pregnant women with recurrent leg cramps (at least twice a week). No disease according to helath certificate. Written participation consent must be signed. Linguistic ability demanded: Norwegian as the first language. Gestation length more than 17 weeks, less than 36 weeks. Twin pregnancy. Oedema. Preeclampsia. Magnesium supplementation beyond the trial treatment.
